website_summaries.verdict: Daily joint supplement that aids you in maintaining your active lifestyle.
pros: An excellent choice if searching for relief from pain and stiffness
Relief can be rather quick if taken daily

customer_reviews.title: Very promising
customer_reviews.text: As I get older, my knees are aching. Never had this problem. Never had a knee injury. I've always been in pretty good shape. But, WTH!!?? It's like all of a sudden, my knees are painful for no reason. I've really been researching, reading a lot of different research results and spoken to others who take supplements. Glucosamine has a lot of support. I started taking Turmeric supplements and it made a difference, but not 100%. I added this product recently and I swear I have no more pain in my knees. I'm actually surprised every morning when I walk down stairs and I don't have to go slower because of the knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I was diagnosed with Lyme's Disease 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was diagnosed with Lyme's Disease 2 years ago. I got better, but my joints never felt quite right. Maybe it's my age (46 yrs old) or the Lyme's. Don't know, but what I do know is my joints haven't felt this good since before I got sick. I can jump across the ditch from my goat pen to my shop and it doesn't hurt any more. I have tried other glucosamine products, but with little to no effect. I feel like it is the combo of ingredients in this formula that makes it good. I'm on my feet a lot in my shop and as a lab tech. I'm amazed.
customer_reviews.author: kritter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Took the glucosamine for a month and no kidding cured a torn rotator cuff I was scheduled to have surgery on. This stuff is definitely not snake oil. Amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Rommey

customer_reviews.title: Schiff glucosimine 2000mg
customer_reviews.text: This has been by far the best joint renew/glucosimine product I have used to date. My list is long of products I have tried and all have worked to some degree but this is by far the best. The relieve is all day and night, I have no proof per say other than the way it feels I think it heals as well as relieves aches. I take two in the morning everyday. I work 4 days a week cardio and free weights. Give it a try I think you'll be happy
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: I went back to Bio-Flex and I feel good again.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this and my knees were aching. I went back to Bio-Flex and I feel good again.
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: It just works!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other glucosamine supplements with no success. I lift 5-6 days a week as well as running 5 miles a day. So my joints are definitely under stress and in pain from time to time. After the first dose of this supplement I noticed a difference and recommended it to everyone I know. It's also the highest rated on labdoor.com. I only take supplements that I know work and have a benefit. This is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: M.Horn

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve done a little research and found this product to be better than your average glucosamine supplement. These pills are easy to take and doesn’t require a crazy daily amount so that’s a good thing. I’ve seen comments from people saying that they feel a difference which makes me wonder what I’m doing wrong. I’ve been taking this every day for about 2 months now and though I like to think it’s helping me, I haven’t really physically felt any benefit. I’m not sure if this isn’t for everyone or if I haven’t taken it as long as I should to feel a difference
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: After knee surgery (arthoscopy) my doctor recommended that I take glucosamine with chondroitin. Several months later, he advised using the glucosamine without the chondroitin. Although it was hard to find at the time, I was able to research and find some at the retail store, but not the quality that I have found in this brand, Schiff Glucosamine 2000mg with Vitamin D3 and Hyaluronic Acid. It seems to be working...my hands (that had had carpal tunnel surgery) are not as swollen and painful as they had been.
customer_reviews.author: IPod Newbie

customer_reviews.title: Quite cost effective
customer_reviews.text: I was using another brand of Glucosamine getting a 30 day supply at a cost considerable higher that Schiff's 75 day supply. I was taking 5 pills a day and now it's only 2. I called customer service to determine the amount of product which is 1000mg per pill opposed to the other brand at 500mg per pill. Brand #1 $50 for 30 day supply Brand #2Schiff $16 for 75 day supply.. Being on a fixed income . That is almost a $600 savings. I feel confident that the comfort I feel is no different than the expensive brand
customer_reviews.author: vanguardians

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Advertising
customer_reviews.text: The advertising on the front of the bottle states that the product is 2000mg of Glucosamine. It is; if you take two tablets! It does say under the Glucosamine name that Vitamin D is included and it is per two tablets. I did not see that for I was only looking for the amount of glucosamine mg ; I was in a hurry, but it is clearly misleading to the consumer. Check for yourself! See what you think. All Glucosamine that I have bought in the past (Walmart & Sam's Club) state the amount on the bottle per tablet. I will never buy a Schiff product again. I don't like this kind of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: DoFe

customer_reviews.title: This product is garbage doesn't use Glucosamine Sulfate which is hundreds of times ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage doesn't use Glucosamine Sulfate which is hundreds of times better than Hydrochloride and the Hyaluronic Acid dose is laughable. It also doesn't have Chondroitin Sulfate in it. I highly recommend getting these from bulk supplements. It's cheaper, you get a better quality product and you can tailor your dose to your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lasted a long time
customer_reviews.text: i didn’t take this every single day, just when i remembered. they lasted 3 months. RA runs in my family, and i believe i’m in the beginning stages but it’s really hard to get a diagnosis. it’s stupid that arthritis specialists preach about how crucial it is to detect it early but are so reluctant to help during the beginning stages. i’ve been taking these to help ease the pain and keep my joints healthy and lubricated, and they did what they said they would.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha B Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good. Good Glucosamine
customer_reviews.text: Okeh, so this really works. I knew with the aches and the noises my knees made going down the steps at work, I needed glucosamine. I tried these and within a week, I was feeling better. These are now in my life about 4 - 5 times per week. I feel so much better. Gratitude.
customer_reviews.author: Mlle Gia

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing right knee pain especially walking down stairs which is associated with runners knee and also pain when running my first 2 miles every time. After 2 months of taking glucosamine the pain has disappeared walking down stairs and is very little if anything when I am running, this product made me a believer in glucosamine
customer_reviews.author: Prtrap

customer_reviews.title: Great for Athlectic joint/knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I jog outdoors on the cement. If it were not for Glucosamine my knees would out. I know this through test of abstaining from the produce a few weeks and then tried jogging, the pain was too intense. After a few days back on Glucosamine I was able to restart my jogging routine.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Arthritis/Gut inflammation Combo Remedy
customer_reviews.text: I added this herbal to my regime to go with Turmeric herbal to treat arthritis and guy inflammation. Seems like I picked the right combo for both. Fantastic at reducing swelling and arthritis pain plus easing IBS gut stuff. Feel like a 50 yr old... not an 80 yr old. Highly recommend pairing these two supplements to see if they work for you!
customer_reviews.author: Diane C.

customer_reviews.title: Real Relief
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my aging father. He's noticed a difference in how his joints feel. Great seller, great price, excellent shipping!
customer_reviews.author: BohemianGirl

customer_reviews.title: Pill is large
customer_reviews.text: The pill is so large I had difficulty swallowing. I called company to see if I could cut in half and they told me no. I have not seen pain relief at all with it and prescribed by Pain Management Physician. I have taken over a year so I have given plenty of time to relive pain.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dailey

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like that it works! You have to take it for a few weeks to feel a difference.. but omg it's awesome.. I won't use anything else!! I have nothing bad to say about this product 😁
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rutter

customer_reviews.title: Schiff has the right idea
customer_reviews.text: while I haven't noticed any dramatic effects from taking Schiff Glucosamine as a stand-alone supplement, adding it to the vitamins I take pre- and post-workout seems to assist in the recovery process. I have been taking glucosamine chondroitin for going on two years and I do notice a difference in the way that my muscles respond to rigorous exercise. Drinking plenty of water also helps, at least half of your body weight in ounces a day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Work as expected. Bought to replace similar Vitamin World brand that was no longer available or discontinued. Same pain relief and joint comfort as with my previous brand. Have had surgery on my knee and both knees have no cartilage both bone on bone. So it is a relief to have found another great working product.
customer_reviews.author: Yellowsuzi99

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I got it for My Labrador Dog ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! I got it for My Labrador Dog that has hip problems and I don't know if that's what make her much better or what but she had an amazing recovery. I give it to her together with fish oil. I already got the second bottle !
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Great for knee pain
customer_reviews.text: The pains of getting older. My sister actually suggested Glucosamine for achy knees. I had used Glocosomine for many of my dogs for just this problem but never thought of it for human use. She had checked with her doctor and found that it was just as good for human use in the same way. It has helped remove the knee aches and pains that have been slowly getting worse over the last years. It takes about 4 to 6 weeks to actually feel the improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t notice a difference
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t tell if my joints did any better on this. It probably didn’t help that a trainer told me that glucosamine helping joint pain was a myth... One star for the benefit of the doubt and one star for them being easy to swallow
customer_reviews.author: K Gaston

customer_reviews.title: does not relieve pain`
customer_reviews.text: i've been taking these for several months now and my knee does feel somewhat better, but it does not totally relieve the pain. the price is not bad, but i dont know if they are worth the money. will give them a few more months and then if not will try something else
customer_reviews.author: colesmom

customer_reviews.title: Husband Likes this product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised, husband has been using for a few years now, this is the best price on the market right now, only issue is he doesn't swallow these as they are larger than he's comfortable swallowing, but doesn't mind chewing them.
customer_reviews.author: Meena

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, smaller bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace a bottle of Schiff Glucosamine 1500 as TWO pills per dose, but these were THREE pills per dose yielding 50% fewer doses. They seem excellent quality and actually easier to swallow but the reduced dosage per bottle forced me to try another brand for the savings.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 7th or 8th purchase. They work. It may take six or so weeks to notice, but they do work and they keep working.
customer_reviews.author: Tropicmom

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for Joints
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this supplement for my 58 yo husband's lower back issues. However, it has helped several other joint issues in the process. Our chiropractor highly recommends use of this supplement.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results
customer_reviews.text: Had pain and stiffness in the knees, whereby it used to be uncomfortable and a bit painful to do some yoga knee bending and folding asanas along with climbing stairs..... but now..... Have been taking 1 a day for the last 2 months.... results are super amazing. Have been pain free for these last 2 months and it's like I never had any pain.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Won't leave home without them
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these for travel as the Vitamin D3 is included. This reduces the amount of stuff I have to haul on my longer trips overseas. I'm in my mid-60's and this necessary supplement was no longer available at my local "club" store. Happy I found it on Amazon and it has an expiration date about 2 years into the future when they'll be long gone. Will order more upon my return from my next trip!
customer_reviews.author: Harry the Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great product won’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Schiff makes great products. I’m 28 I couldn’t really tell if it was helping me or not but as for others much older then me age 45+ I have heard that this helps with keeping their joints pain free increasing mobility.

customer_reviews.title: Completely eliminated pain in knees.
customer_reviews.text: If youre having joint issues, particularly in your knees, BUY this. They WORK. Do give it a couple of weeks to kick in. Take 3 once a day.

customer_reviews.title: The product worked well, and I would have continued ...

customer_reviews.title: Don't stop once you get used to taking.

customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for arthritis and spbegubinal stenosis. I feel much better since I've begun taking it.

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I was going crazy when at age 30 my ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday for knee pain. I felt like I was going crazy when at age 30 my knees started hurting after I sat too long. I started taking these at a nurse friend's recommendation and it helps a lot. It took a few weeks for the glucosamine to build up in my system enough to help. If I stop taking it, about a week later the pain creeps back in. Remember that a friend's opinion (or amazon review) is not a substitute for seeing a medical doctor. This medicine works for me, and if you are shopping for glucosamine this is a solid product.

customer_reviews.title: I take 2 tablets  every 8 hours

customer_reviews.author: Marc Capone

customer_reviews.title: Good Glucosamine
customer_reviews.text: This Glucosamine works the best for me for pain in my knees. Price is good. Wish they didn't change the capsules to a smaller size so now have to take 3.
customer_reviews.author: jopojo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used for some time and I definitely notice when I'm not taking it.
customer_reviews.author: amr

customer_reviews.title: PAIN RELIEF
customer_reviews.text: It relieved rotary cuff pain by 95% in my left shoulder. Physical therapy and steroids offered only temporary relief.
customer_reviews.author: Dean L.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best glucosamine compound I have found yet - great price ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best glucosamine compound I have found yet - great price and easy to swallow pills. Will continue to purchase this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Make your miracle
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for over twenty years and the projected shoulder replacement surgery has never happened. My surgeon told me that it is the miracle drug of the 1990's. It doesn't happen over night but with continued use it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Schiff Glucosamine 2000mg with Vitamin D3 and Hyaluronic Acid, 150 tablets - Joint Supplement
product_meta.description:
Style:Glucosamine + D3Product Description Schiff Glucosamine Plus Vitamin D3 helps lubricate and protect joints by helping you maintain healthy structure and function of cartilage in your joints.* It contains Glucosamine Hydrochloride (HCl) which has a high potency of active Glucosamine. Glucosamine HCl is about 83% Glucosamine while some brands use Glucosamine Sulfate that is only about 65% Glucosamine. The recommended serving size is 2 softgels daily to get your daily dose of 2000mg of Glucosamine. Schiff guaranteed for purity, freshness and labeled potency. Amazon.com Schiff Glucosamine Plus Vitamin D Tablets help you maintain healthy cartilage in your joints. This maximum-strength formula contains the highest potency form of glucosamine along with joint fluid (hyaluronic acid) to protect, strengthen, and lubricate joints. Plus is contains Vitamin D to support overall bone health and joint movement. Schiff Glucosamine HCI makes taking glucosamine easier than ever thanks to coated tablets that make for more comfortable swallowing. When taken as directed, this supplement can help improve joint mobility so you move with ease. Glucosamine 2,000 mg Plus Vitamin D (150 Coated Tablets) At a Glance: Maximum-strength formula with the highest potency form of glucosamine Joint fluid protects and cushions joints Maintains healthy function of joint cartilage Easy-to-swallow, fast-dissolving tablets Guaranteed for purity, freshness, and label potency These tablets provide a high dose of glucosamine, which helps support healthy cartilage and maintain structural integrity of joints and connective tissue. View larger. Highest Potency Glucosamine Keeps Joints Strong Glucosamine helps support healthy cartilage and maintain structural integrity of joints and connective tissue. Glucosamine is a building block for joint fluid, cartilage, tendons, ligaments, membrane, and blood vessels. Just two tablets of Schiff Glucosamine Plus provides 2,000 milligrams of glucosamine HCl, the highest potency of active glucosamine. While most brands use glucosamine sulfate that is only 65 percent glucosamine, Schiff Glucosamine Plus uses nearly 83 percent glucosamine for a stronger dose of joint support. Vitamin D Keeps Bones Strong As we age our bones lose calcium, which can compromise overall bone health and joint movement. Vitamin D addresses this problem by helping bones absorb calcium better and helps bones retain the calcium already in them. Two Glucosamine Plus tablets provide 2,000 IU of joint-healthy Vitamin D3. Joint Fluid to Protect and Cushion Joints This supplement also contains 3.3 milligrams of joint fluid (hyaluronic acid), a potent form of the molecule in lubricating fluid that exists naturally in joints. As we age, the level of hyaluronic acid in the body tends to decrease. The good news is that because hyaluronic acid is naturally present throughout the body, built-in pathways can absorb and utilize it. A clinical study shows that when taken orally, as with a nutritional supplement like Schiff's Glucosamine Plus, hyaluronic acid absorbed directly into the joints. Quick-Dissolve Formula for Better Absorption This supplement has Schiff's Sure Dissolve formula, which means it's made to disintegrate in the body within one hour for improved absorption and less waste. Guaranteed Quality Schiff supplements are guaranteed for purity, freshness, and label potency. About Schiff Schiff, a leader in the natural supplement industry for more than 70 years, is one of the most trusted and respected nutrition brands due to its focus on research, innovation, and the delivery of high-quality dietary supplements. One of Schiff's major breakthroughs was its discovery that rose hips provided a more concentrated source of Vitamin C than orange juice. Schiff was also the first to introduce this Vitamin C source to America and to produce the first natural source multivitamin, Schiff V-Complette. Schiff emphasizes the use of the finest ingredients to ensure every product meets strict standards for identity, purity, and stability. The Schiff brand is owned by Schiff Nutrition Group, which develops, manufactures, markets, and sells branded and private label vitamins and nutritional supplements in the United States and throughout the world. What's in the Box Glucosamine Plus Vitamin D Tablets, 150-count bottles * These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Trademark Information: Schiff®

AMAZON.COM


Schiff Glucosamine Plus Vitamin D Tablets help you maintain healthy cartilage in your joints. This maximum-strength formula contains the highest potency form of glucosamine along with joint fluid (hyaluronic acid) to protect, strengthen, and lubricate joints. Plus is contains Vitamin D to support overall bone health and joint movement. Schiff Glucosamine HCI makes taking glucosamine easier than ever thanks to coated tablets that make for more comfortable swallowing. When taken as directed, this supplement can help improve joint mobility so you move with ease.

GLUCOSAMINE 2,000 MG
PLUS VITAMIN D
(150 COATED TABLETS)
AT A GLANCE:
 * Maximum-strength formula with the highest potency form of glucosamine
 * Joint fluid protects and cushions joints
 * Maintains healthy function of joint cartilage
 * Easy-to-swallow, fast-dissolving tablets
 * Guaranteed for purity, freshness, and label potency

These tablets provide a high dose of glucosamine, which helps support healthy cartilage and maintain structural integrity of joints and connective tissue.
View larger. HIGHEST POTENCY GLUCOSAMINE KEEPS JOINTS STRONG
Glucosamine helps support healthy cartilage and maintain structural integrity of joints and connective tissue. Glucosamine is a building block for joint fluid, cartilage, tendons, ligaments, membrane, and blood vessels. Just two tablets of Schiff Glucosamine Plus provides 2,000 milligrams of glucosamine HCl, the highest potency of active glucosamine. While most brands use glucosamine sulfate that is only 65 percent glucosamine, Schiff Glucosamine Plus uses nearly 83 percent glucosamine for a stronger dose of joint support.

VITAMIN D KEEPS BONES STRONG
As we age our bones lose calcium, which can compromise overall bone health and joint movement. Vitamin D addresses this problem by helping bones absorb calcium better and helps bones retain the calcium already in them. Two Glucosamine Plus tablets provide 2,000 IU of joint-healthy Vitamin D3.

JOINT FLUID TO PROTECT AND CUSHION JOINTS
This supplement also contains 3.3 milligrams of joint fluid (hyaluronic acid), a potent form of the molecule in lubricating fluid that exists naturally in joints. As we age, the level of hyaluronic acid in the body tends to decrease. The good news is that because hyaluronic acid is naturally present throughout the body, built-in pathways can absorb and utilize it. A clinical study shows that when taken orally, as with a nutritional supplement like Schiff's Glucosamine Plus, hyaluronic acid absorbed directly into the joints.

QUICK-DISSOLVE FORMULA FOR BETTER ABSORPTION
This supplement has Schiff's Sure Dissolve formula, which means it's made to disintegrate in the body within one hour for improved absorption and less waste.

GUARANTEED QUALITY
Schiff supplements are guaranteed for purity, freshness, and label potency.

ABOUT SCHIFF
Schiff, a leader in the natural supplement industry for more than 70 years, is one of the most trusted and respected nutrition brands due to its focus on research, innovation, and the delivery of high-quality dietary supplements. One of Schiff's major breakthroughs was its discovery that rose hips provided a more concentrated source of Vitamin C than orange juice. Schiff was also the first to introduce this Vitamin C source to America and to produce the first natural source multivitamin, Schiff V-Complette.

Schiff emphasizes the use of the finest ingredients to ensure every product meets strict standards for identity, purity, and stability. The Schiff brand is owned by Schiff Nutrition Group, which develops, manufactures, markets, and sells branded and private label vitamins and nutritional supplements in the United States and throughout the world.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Glucosamine Plus Vitamin D Tablets, 150-count bottles 


* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Schiff®
